document.discussion_title: Numis Securities Ltd Trims Helical Bar plc (HLCL) Target Price to GBX 481
document.topic_text: Tweet Helical Bar plc (LON:HLCL) had its target price trimmed by Numis Securities Ltd from GBX 550 ($7.08) to GBX 481 ($6.19) in a research report sent to investors on Tuesday morning. The firm currently has a buy rating on the stock. Helical Bar plc ( LON:HLCL ) opened at 279.75 on Tuesday. The firm’s 50 day moving average price is GBX 268.38 and its 200-day moving average price is GBX 350.89. Helical Bar plc has a 12-month low of GBX 228.00 and a 12-month high of GBX 475.50. The stock’s market cap is GBX 319.70 million. The business also recently declared a dividend, which was paid on Friday, July 29th. Investors of record on Thursday, June 30th were given a GBX 0.72 ($0.01) dividend. The ex-dividend date of this dividend was Thursday, June 30th. This represents a yield of 0.18%. HLCL has been the subject of a number of other research reports. Peel Hunt restated an add rating and set a GBX 450 ($5.79) price objective on shares of Helical Bar plc in a research report on Tuesday, May 24th. JPMorgan Chase & Co. restated an overweight rating and set a GBX 540 ($6.95) price objective on shares of Helical Bar plc in a research report on Thursday, May 12th. Two research analysts have rated the stock with a hold rating and three have issued a buy rating to the company. Helical Bar plc presently has a consensus rating of Buy and a consensus price target of GBX 483.40 ($6.22). In related news, insider Cotton ,Richard purchased 15,000 shares of the company’s stock in a transaction that occurred on Thursday, July 7th. The stock was bought at an average price of GBX 234 ($3.01) per share, for a total transaction of £35,100 ($45,197.01). Also, insider Slade,Michael purchased 42,392 shares of the company’s stock in a transaction that occurred on Monday, July 25th. The stock was bought at an average price of GBX 273 ($3.52) per share, with a total value of £115,730.16 ($149,021.58). Helical Bar plc is a property investment and development company, which operates across various sectors of the property industry. The Company’s segments include Investment properties and Developments. Investment properties are owned or leased by the Company for long-term income and for capital appreciation, and Trading properties, which are owned or leased with the intention to sell. Helical Bar plc Helical Bar plc
